name: Spotify Popup
description: Add a popup window to embed and showcase your Spotify tracks, albums or playlists. Perfect for musicians who want to share their music content!

settings.content: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/track/TRACK_ID" width="100%" height="352" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
